text: Costa Rica competed in the Summer Olympic Games for the first time at the 1936 Summer Olympics in Berlin, Germany. A single competitor, Bernardo de la Guardia, took part in the individual sabre event. ==Fencing== One fencer represented Costa Rica in 1936. ;Men's sabre * Bernardo de la Guardia ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1936 Summer Olympics 1936 Summer Olympics Category:1936 in Costa Rica
